| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | --------- | ----------- |

## Events

| Event          | Description                                                        | Type                                    |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------- |
| `guxexpandrow` | Triggers when a table row with a nested expandable-row is clicked. | `CustomEvent<GuxTableExpandedRowState>` |
